channel.title: Lol, little client edit to show a map region - birds eye view almost
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u116/the_owner2007/clientview.jpg[/img]
I saw someone on mitb who made a thing for runescape, that can make it look like the camera is following you and its first person, but i looked through the client i have and saw this simple thing.
If i knew how to remove fog of war it would be 100x better, because i could get coords for all places.
Here is anothing picture:
[IMG]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u116/the_owner2007/magebank.jpg[/img]
Also, i can go further out, but the map just gets ruined, its too small because of the fog of war.

item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

http://zachera.com/fow250.png
http://zachera.com/fow250[2].png
http://zachera.com/fow250[3].png

http://zachera.ws/files/images/jpg/rs1.jpg

The first three I did on 2008-05-09.

The last one was done by wL. I could achieve what he did with his client, but I’d need a stronger computer to handle the massive map loading.

you wanna see further but i wanna load new area… ill try to fix ur problem
Just gimme some time
